data.title: 19 Select Team for International Bowl IX at AT&T Stadium
data.meta_description: USA Football has announced the Under-19 Select Team roster and coaching staff for International Bowl IX, set for Jan. 12-19 in Arlington, Texas. See which players and coa
data.text:
Forty-eight high school student-athletes spanning 22 states have been selected for the 2018 U.S. Under-19 Select Team.

The U.S. team will compete against Team Nordic on Friday at International Bowl IX at AT&T Stadium in Arlington, Texas, home of the NFL’s Dallas Cowboys and college football’s Goodyear Cotton Bowl. Kickoff is at 8 p.m. Central Time (9 p.m. Eastern).

RELATED CONTENT: USA Football announces U.S. Under-19 National Team for International Bowl IX at AT&T Stadium

RELATED CONTENT: USA Football announces U.S. Under-18 National Team for International Bowl IX at AT&T Stadium

International Bowl IX features 24 teams across eight nations on three continents. U.S. National Teams will compete against teams representing Canada, Japan, Mexico and the Nordic region, comprised of players and coaches from Denmark, Finland, Norway and Sweden. As a member of the U.S. Olympic Committee and the sport’s national governing body, USA Football manages U.S. National Teams for international competition.

All International Bowl games will be played at AT&T Stadium. Game days are Friday, Jan. 12; Wednesday, Jan. 17; and Friday, Jan. 19, each consisting of four games.

RELATED CONTENT: USA Football announces U.S. Under-17 National Team for International Bowl IX at AT&T Stadium

RELATED CONTENT: USA Football announces U.S. Under-16 National Team for International Bowl IX at AT&T Stadium

International Bowl game tickets and details are available at internationalbowlix.org.

The head coach of the U.S. Under-19 Select Team is Adam Neugebauer, wide receivers coach at Georgetown University.

RELATED CONTENT: USA Football announces Under-15 Stars, Stripes, Select teams for International Bowl IX at AT&T Stadium

RELATED CONTENT: USA Football announces Under-14 Stars, Stripes teams for International Bowl IX at AT&T Stadium

U.S. National Team alumni include wide receiver Corey Coleman (Cleveland Browns), wide receiver Devin Funchess (Carolina Panthers), running back Todd Gurley (Los Angeles Rams), defensive back Tyrann Mathieu (Arizona Cardinals), offensive lineman Jack Mewhort (Indianapolis Colts), running back Samaje Perine (Washington Redskins), defensive end Stephon Tuitt (Pittsburgh Steelers) and quarterback Jameis Winston (Tampa Bay Buccaneers).

RELATED CONTENT: USA Football announces U.S. Under-17 Stars and Stripes teams for International Bowl IX at AT&T Stadium

RELATED CONTENT: USA Football announces U.S. Under-16 Select Team for International Bowl IX at AT&T Stadium
